message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.MM, cs.AI, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with the task of describing videos automatically with natural language, which falls under computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL). The proposed task of crowd video captioning also involves understanding the behavior of a crowd, which could be related to multimedia (cs.MM) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the evaluation of baseline methods and captioning models involves machine learning (cs.LG).
